me.soxey6.engine.managers.input

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.soxey6.engine.managers.input.InputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The input Manager class is used for managing the input of the users peripherals. They simply check to see if there are changes, if so, trigger events that can be hooked. Use is fairly basic but this really shouldn't be touched as it will do what you want it to do.
    Author:
    pchilds
